pullRequest.title: Release azure cosmos 4.9.0
pullRequest.bodyText:
azure-cosmos ->
4.9.0 (2020-12-11)
New Features

Added Beta API for Bulk Operations.
Added getRegionsContacted API in CosmosDiagnostics.
Added Diagnostics for CosmosStoredProcedureResponse.
Added trouble shooting guide links to CosmosException.

Key Bug Fixes

Adding automatic retries on client-side transient failures on writes while possible with still being idempotent.
Fixed NPE on getDiagnostics for CosmosStoredProcedureResponse.
Fixed empty resourceAddress in CosmosException.

azure-spring-data-cosmos ->
3.2.0 (2020-12-11)
New Features

Updated Spring Data Commons version to 2.3.5.RELEASE.
Updated Spring Core version to 5.2.10.RELEASE.

Key Bug Fixes

Fixed publishing of spring.factories file with released jar.
Fixed repository query with repeated parameters.

commit.message: Added Beta warning text to the APIs
Updated Warning text on all Beta APIs
Updated versions for release azure-cosmos 4.9.0 and azure-spring-data-cosmos 3.2.0
Added beta tags to Transactional Batch APIs

nodes.bodyText:
Set<URI> CosmosDiagnostics.getRegionsContacted()
I might have missed this earlier in the PR.
two comments:

For CosmosClientBuilder.endpoint(String) we pass the endpoint as String not URI, but in the above newly added API we return the endpoint as URI. seems inconsistent to me.
For other apis when we return a collection we return Iterable not Set.

Can we tag this new API with Beta annotation for now. So if we can have the option of changing it later?

commit.message: Added beta tag to getRegionsContacted API
